resources.string: This provides basic energy management service.
You\'re using incorrect platform, lots of features cannot work. \nPlease contact Jouler Energy Manager support.
BlackList will provide an app list, you can choose multiple apps. \nThe app you choosed will be punished to save energy.
WhiteList will provide an app list, you can choose multiple apps. \nThe app you choosed will get full energy supply, other apps will get lower energy supply.

LifeTime feature allows you to set the minimum number of hours you want your device to last in full discharging cycle. \nAs additional parameters you are asked to enter the battery threshold when the energy manager starts monitoring and the battery threshold when it aggressively tries to control energy consumption of the whole device.
